content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=42.5, y=-80.5), and (x=43.5, y=-80.5)

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (x=-13.0, y=-48.0), (x=-11.0, y=-48.0), and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0)
- Wooden Chests at positions (x=-14.5, y=-48.5), (x=-12.5, y=-49.5), and (x=-9.5, y=-49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-15.5, y=-48.5), (x=-14.5, y=-46.5), and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity you are extracting from has the required items and is not obstructed by other entities or conditions.

### Errors when placing entities
- Verify that the target tile is unoccupied before attempting to place a new entity to avoid placement failures.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up to prevent idle inserters.

### Errors when transferring items to furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is accessible and has the required conditions met for item transfer.
